p:
This study was nested within a population-based surveillance study for suspected pneumonia, septicemia and meningitis, designed to measure the impact of PCV introduction. Surveillance methodology
10 and results
3, 11 have been previously published. Surveillance commenced in 2008 and included all BHDSS residents. We added the collection of nasopharyngeal (NP) and oropharyngeal (OP) swabs from all surveillance patients from February 2015 onwards with the aim to measure pneumococcal carriage. The study presented here used data and stored specimens collected between February 10 and December 31, 2015.
